name: postgresql
description: PostgreSQL is a powerful open-source relational database management system featuring advanced SQL capabilities, extensions, robust concurrency, and replication. It runs on all major platforms and supports extensive integrations.

features.title: ACID Compliance
features.description: Ensure data integrity with full support for atomic transactions, consistency, isolation, and durability

features.title: Advanced SQL Queries
features.description: Execute complex queries with support for CTEs, window functions, JSON operations, and full-text search

features.title: Extensibility
features.description: Add custom functions, data types, and operators using procedural languages like PL/pgSQL and PL/Python

features.title: Replication
features.description: Implement high availability with streaming replication, logical replication, and failover capabilities

features.title: Performance Optimization
features.description: Improve query performance on large tables with declarative partitioning and automatic partition management

features.title: Foreign Data Wrappers
features.description: Query external data sources including other databases, files, and APIs as if they were local

features.title: JSONB Support
features.description: Store and query JSON documents with indexing and efficient binary storage format

features.title: Concurrent Access
features.description: Handle thousands of concurrent connections with MVCC for non-blocking reads and writes
